question:
My New Backpack    I have a new backpack. Its color is soft green. I
always bring it when I go to school. It is made of strong
fabric. There are several parts of my backpack. The first
part is the pocket. I put my money and my library card
in the pocket. The second part is the main part. I put my
books and pencil case in this part. The third part is a
small pocket on the left side of the backpack. I keep a
bottle of water in this pocket.
1. How many parts of the writer's backpack?
2. What is the function of the main part of the backpack?
3. blue - He-pale-has-eyes - skin - and
1 2 3 4
4 5
5 6 7
nac these sentences into the correct order.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1.three parts

2.to put his books and pencil case

3.he has blue eyes and pale skin

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu

Jawaban:

1. four [ 4 ]

2.in pocket I can put my money and my library card.

the second is i can also put a pencil and book holder

and the last thing is that I can put a water bottle in the side pocket

3. [ sorry nomor tiga aku ga tau jawaban nya ]

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu, Semangat belajar nya

related_questions.question:
43. Answer the questions    Dear Johnathan
Please don't forget to pick up our son at 12 o'clock at his school. And also on forget to take his fou
lunch, he would love to have some spaghetti and ice cream
With love, Plumary
a. Who is receive the short message?
b. Who is sending the short message?
c. What must Johnathan do?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A.Johnathan

B.Plumary

C.Pick up his son at 12 o'clock dan give his lunch to him

Jawaban:

a. Plumary's husband

b. Plumary is sending the short message

c. He must pick up their son at 12 o'clock at his school

Penjelasan:

Moga berguna

Dafa She is in our school library. She went there with Ms. Nina, our school librarian, a few
minutes ago
Onci
Dafa
What does she do in the library?
She helps Ms. Nina and Mr. Eko to check and arrange the books. She usually also helps the
library visitors to find some books. She always is in the library on Monday and Wednesday.​
